## Dumping ROMs

Dumping ROMs is covered in a document about backing up games across all systems of interest.

## Writing ROMs

The RetroBlaster 2.0 can also write ROMs to RetroStage's Blaster cartridges. This is the main differentiator from the simpler Retrode 2. The Blaster cartridges are reusable and are compatible with original hardware.
